attributes.action: treaty initiated by Singapore Hwa Chi Lin with German Officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hi,

Treaty initiated by Singapore Hwa Chi Lin and being agreed by German Officers in Germnany.

MI5 should already know the content of it.

The Treaty must be cancealed. Mr. Gordon Brown must order Hwa Chi Lin to canceal it, in Germany.

England on its single side can not canceal it.

regards

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
